content.raw:
That sounds fair enough - we shouldn't remove the accidental queue until we replace it with an intentional one since it is serving a practical purpose. And you might as well keep using the patch in this pull request in your fork until we make it redundant, it probably will not see many merge conflicts in the meantime.

Out of interest, what is the ratio of the time it takes your shots to compile to the time it takes them to run?

Not much point before labscript 3, but then it would be nice to profile some typical shot compilations to see how they could be made faster.
